name: df-djh
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cdjh, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, cfv(clh, cv(s0)), cmpo(s2, s3, cpw(cfv(cbs, cfv(cfv(cdvh, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))), cpw(cfv(cbs, cfv(cfv(cdvh, cv(s0)), cv(s1)))), cfv(cfv(cfv(coch, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cin(cfv(cfv(cfv(coch, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cv(s2)), cfv(cfv(cfv(coch, cv(s0)), cv(s1)), cv(s3))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ joinH =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà(LHyp ` s0)‚Ü¶(s2 ‚àà P((Base `((DVecH ` s0)` s1))), s3 ‚àà P((Base `((DVecH ` s0)` s1)))‚Ü¶(((ocH ` s0)` s1)`((((ocH ` s0)` s1)` s2)‚ãÇ(((ocH ` s0)` s1)` s3))))))
comment: Define (closed) subspace join for ` DVecH ` vector space. (Contributed by NM, 19-Jul-2014.)
